Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 19th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/6/2015...
Injured on 5/9/2015 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Struck out 16 batters against St. Louis (C) on 8/9/2015...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2016, going 3-1, 2.00...
Traded from San Francisco to St. Louis (B) on 2/8/2017 (Going to SF: P Roberto Ortiz, P Christopher Smith, 1B Robert Dunn. Going to SLB: P Jeffrey Horne)...
Had first career hit on 4/29/2017, off Jeremy Fletcher (NY)...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2018, going 6-0, 1.40...
Won Cy Young in 2018, going 22-10, 2.48 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2019, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2019, going 4-1, 1.43...
Struck out 15 batters against Houston on 7/24/2019...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/12/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $17,700,500 per year...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Traded from New York to Chicago on 6/30/2021 (Going to NY: LF Stephen Gullion, RF Michael Bitner. Going to CHI: P Jeffrey Horne, 2B John James, 3B Fausto Ocerin)...
Injured on 7/31/2021 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Houston on 2/10/2022 (Going to HOU: P Jeffrey Horne. Going to CHI: P Carlos Villaran)...
